name: CareConnect-AllergyCertainty-1
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the certainty of an allergy.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Unlikely [The reaction is thought unlikely to have been caused by the agent.]
Likely [The reaction is thought likely to have been caused by the agent.]
concept.definition: Likely [The reaction is thought likely to have been caused by the agent.]
